author: doll
msg: All getField calls now return escaped data. This prevents the doEvil flag from doing real harm in the SocialHelloWorld. As long as gadgets don't use unescape they should be safe from bad data.
Changed the escapeString function to check if the passed in object is a string (makes the opensocial code cleaner)

author: doll
msg: Changed JsonContainer to take in params for path, domain and supportedFields. This allows for better extensibility. Also changed SocialDataServlet to return an empty object by default.
The compliance tests now run... but obviously don't pass all cases.

author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-2172: DateField component shows up misplaced in major browsers

author: sobryan
msg: PORTLETBRIDGE-24 - Modify project structure to allow two trunks
* Changed the site project to reflect the changes
* Modified the pom files to work with the master pom
* Made the old apt files vm apt files to make it easier to adapt various
